DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion Criteria Males female , 18 77 year old , type 2 diabetes inadequate glycemic control Participants receive metformin total daily dose ≥1500 mg per day least 8 week Cpeptide ≥1.0 ng/mL Body mass index ≤45.0 kg/m^2 Serum creatinine level < 1.50 mg/dL men < 1.40 mg/dL woman . Key Exclusion Criteria Aspartate aminotransferase and/or alanine aminotransferase level > 3.0 time upper limit normal Serum total bilirubin level > 2 mg/dL Creatinine kinase level > 3 time upper limit normal Symptoms severely uncontrolled diabetes Serum creatinine level ≥1.50 mg/dL men ≥1.40 mg/dL woman Currently unstable serious cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , hematologic , oncologic , endocrine , psychiatric , rheumatic disease
